headline: Ask HN: Do Fuel Tabs Work?
description:
With soaring gasoline prices I see a lot of people recommending switching to lower octane gas and add fuel tabs to compensate. But I found this online: https://www.ftc.gov/news-events/news/press-releases/2013/11/marketers-who-claimed-fuel-additive-could-drastically-increase-fuel-economy-reduce-emissions-settle

Is this only this one brand or all are brands are scamming?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 燃油标签是否有效？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 燃油標籤是否有效？
description_zh-Hans:
随着汽油价格的飙升，我看到很多人建议改用辛烷值较低的汽油，并添加燃料标签来补偿。但我在网上发现了这个：https://www.ftc.gov/news-events/news/press-releases/2013/11/marketers-who-claimed-fuel-additive-could-drastically-increase-fuel-economy-reduce-emissions-settle

是只有这一个品牌还是所有品牌都在骗人？
description_zh-Hant:
隨著汽油價格的飆升，我看到很多人建議改用辛烷值較低的汽油，並添加燃料標籤來補償。但我在網上發現了這個：https://www.ftc.gov/news-events/news/press-releases/2013/11/marketers-who-claimed-fuel-additive-could-drastically-increase-fuel-economy-reduce-emissions-settle

是隻有這一個品牌還是所有品牌都在騙人？
